tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE crowdfunding_projects (
  project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  project_description TEXT,
  funding_goal DECIMAL(10, 2),
  start_date TIMESTAMP,
  end_date TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE crowdfunding_projects (
    project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE project_details (
    detail_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    project_id INT REFERENCES crowdfunding_projects(project_id),
    backers_count INT,
    goal_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    pledged_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    success BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE crowdfunding_projects (
    project_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    project_name VARCHAR(255),
    project_description TEXT,
    project_goal DECIMAL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE backers (
    backer_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    backer_name VARCHAR(255),
    email VARCHAR(255),
    total_backed DECIMAL,
    last_backed_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE crowdfunding_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255),
  creator_name VARCHAR(255),
  funds_needed DECIMAL,
  funds_raised DECIMAL,
  project_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE backers (
  backer_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  backer_name VARCHAR(255),
  email VARCHAR(255),
  total_pledged DECIMAL,
  total_projects_backed INT
)

CREATE TABLE project_updates (
  update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  update_content TEXT,
  update_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE project_comments (
  comment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_id INT,
  commenter_name VARCHAR(255),
  comment_content TEXT,
  comment_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE crowdfunding_projects (
  project_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  project_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  project_description TEXT,
  project_owner VARCHAR(100),
  project_start_date DATE,
  project_end_date DATE,
  funding_goal FLOAT
);

CREATE TABLE project_backers (
  project_id INT,
  backer_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (project_id, backer_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES crowdfunding_projects(project_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (backer_id) REFERENCES backers(backer_id)
);

CREATE TABLE project_categories (
  project_id INT,
  category_id INT,
  PRIMARY KEY (project_id, category_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (project_id) REFERENCES crowdfunding_projects(project_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (category_id) REFERENCES categories(category_id)
);
